Body: Possible Duplicate:  What is SNS App?  Everything I try to do (Text, Video, Email, Call out, Apps, Games) I get an "SNS not working" message and have to force close.  I am having a lot of trouble with this phone.  Its a Cricket LG Droid.Now a lot of my friends & family cannot receive my texts or calls.  It seems that all calls from my phone go directly to their voicemail without it even ringing.  No really, I stood right there with friends calling their phones and they never rang.  What can I do?
Title: What does "SNS" mean on Android?

history.Text: EVERYTHING I TRY TO DO = TEXT, VIDEO, EMAIL, CALL OUT, APPS, GAMES. I GET "SNS NOT WORKING" MESSAGE AND HAVE TO FORCE CLOSE. I AM HAVING ALOT OF TROUBLE WITH THIS PHONE. ITS A CRICKET LG DROID AND IM NOT THE MOST TECH SAVY PERSON ON THE BLOCK. NOW ALOT OF MY FRIENDS & FAMILY CANNOT RECIEVE MY TEXTS OR CALLS. SEEMS ALL CALLS FROM MY PHONE GO DIRECTLY TO THIER VOICEMAIL WITHOUT IT EVEN RINGING.......NO REALLY, I STOOD RIGHT THERE WITH FRIENDS CALLING THIER PHONES AND THEY NEVER RANG......WHAT CAN I DO?

NOW ALOT OF MY FRIENDS & FAMILY CANNOT RECIEVE MY TEXTS OR CALLS. SEEMS ALL CALLS FROM MY PHONE GO DIRECTLY TO THIER VOICEMAIL WITHOUT IT EVEN RINGING.......NO REALLY, I STOOD RIGHT THERE WITH FRIENDS CALLING THIER PHONES AND THEY NEVER RANG......WHAT CAN I DO?

Everything I try to do (Text, Video, Email, Call out, Apps, Games) I get an "SNS not working" message and have to force close.  I am having a lot of trouble with this phone.  Its a Cricket LG Droid.Now a lot of my friends & family cannot receive my texts or calls.  It seems that all calls from my phone go directly to their voicemail without it even ringing.  No really, I stood right there with friends calling their phones and they never rang.  What can I do?
